title: `kafka` provider schema
description: The `kafka_client` root schema comprises the entire provider databag for this interface.

username.title: Kafka SASL/SCRAM username
username.description: Username for connecting to the Kafka cluster

password.title: Kafka SASL/SCRAM password
password.description: Password for connecting to the Kafka cluster

endpoints.title: Kafka bootstrap-servers
endpoints.description: A comma-seperated list of host:ip for each Kafka broker

consumer-group-prefix.title: Kafka consumer group prefix
consumer-group-prefix.description: A prefix for wildcard consumer-group ids that have been granted permissions

zookeeper-uris.title: ZooKeeper uri
zookeeper-uris.description: A comma-seperated list of ZooKeeper server uris, and Kafka cluster zNode

entity-name.title: Entity name
entity-name.description: Name for the requested custom entity.

entity-password.title: Entity password
entity-password.description: Password for the requested custom entity.
